llm_command:
python
# Correcting the patch command for frontend network policy to allow ingress from checkoutservice on port 5050
kubectl patch networkpolicy frontend -n default --type=json -p '[{"op": "add", "path": "/spec/ingress/0/from", "value": [{"podSelector": {"matchLabels": {"app": "checkoutservice"}}}]}, {"op": "add", "path": "/spec/ingress/0/ports", "value": [{"port": 5050, "protocol": "TCP"}]}]'
